game.name: Hollow Steps
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You are a customer of a virtual world company Dartom Inc. You are one of the many people who wants to test themselves in one of the many worlds created by the company. On your test, a ghost in the system will change your experience.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are a customer of a virtual world company Dartom Inc. You are one of the many people who wants to test themselves in one of the many worlds created by the company. On your test, a ghost in the system will change your experience.

reviewHighlights.text: 클리어는 했지만 도저히 뭘 말하고자 하는지 알 수 없는 게임이다. 세이브도 안되서 한 번에 깨야 되고 공략보면 1시간이면 끝나니 도전과제 100%할 사람만 하자.
